unnormalised: Guys, Delhi Traffic is a whole new level of crazy, right? New rules are in effect starting October 10th, so buckle up and pay attention, warna challan pakka! They're cracking down HARD on everything from signal jumping to lane discipline, especially around busy areas like Chandni Chowk.
normalised: Guys, Delhi Traffic is a whole new level of crazy, right? New rules are in effect starting tenth October, so buckle up and pay attention, warna challan pakka! They're cracking down HARD on everything from signal jumping to lane discipline, especially around busy areas like Chandni Chowk. Heard they're even using A I-powered cameras now - no escaping those guys! Fines are hefty, starting from rupee five hundred and going all the way up to a few thousand for repeat offenders. Think twice before showing off your driving skills, especially if you've had a bit too much biryani during this festive season. Apparently, there's been a significant increase in accidents within a five kilometer radius of major Onam celebrations this year, prompting this sudden crackdown. The Transport Department is collaborating with I I T-Delhi to analyze accident data and optimize traffic flow. So, basically, drive safe, follow the rules, and avoid adding to the Delhi traffic chaos! Let’s make our roads safer, one less challan at a time! Remember your indicators, and drive defensively! Jai Hind!
